Articles.Content: OK, so I decided to reinstall KSP since I had too many mods and it was getting slow. I go to the website and it goes kaput--it just screams "500 Internal Server Error" at me like I can fix it or something. I wait a few minutes, it's still kaput. Does anyone know what's going on? Thanks!
It should be backup related and over in about 10 minutes
Understood. Thank you. Good to know it isn't something more serious.
